Introduction

ChaeYeon is a South Korean singer, dancer, rapper, actress, and model under MODHAUS.

In 2008, ChaeYeon made her debut as a child actress in the movie "Scandal Makers". In 2014, she debuted in the kid group CutieL under IONE Entertainment. She departed from the group in 2017.

She debuted as a member of Busters under JTG Entertainment and Marbling E&M on November 27, 2017, with the single album "Dream On". Her departure from the group was announced by Marbling E&M on August 6, 2020.

On July 21, 2021, she signed an exclusive contract with YK Media Plus. It was revealed that she left the agency on May 23, 2022.

ChaeYeon was introduced as the fourth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS on June 22, 2022. She debuted with the first ten members of the group on February 13, 2023, with the mini album "ASSEMBLE".

As a member of tripleS, ChaeYeon was placed in the sub-units +(KR)ystal Eyes, ACID EYES, EVOLution, Aria, and Hatchi!.
